Label: MYT1
Comment: myelin transcription factor 1</br>proof of Mecp2 inhibition  in Oligodendrocytes

Label: mmu-miR-184-3p
Comment: The effect of Mecp2 on miR-184 is discussed controversially: Nomura et al. 2008 reports an Mecp2 dependant repression of miR-184 while Liu et al. 2010 reports no effect of Mecp2 but an MBD1 dependant regulation of miR-184

Label: mmu-miR-137-5p
Comment: influences neuronal stem cell proliferation and differentiation</br>MeCP2 and Sox2 bind directly to the 5' regulatory region of miR-137 in aNSCs

Label: HB1
Comment: chromatin factor, data obtained using human cell line and mouse primary tissue

Label: YB1
Comment: data obtained with human cell line and mouse primary tissue

Label: mmu-miR-130a-3p
Comment: Base sequence! It is unclear which mature miRNA was tested.

Label: mmu-miR-130b
Comment: reported for human only</br>binding site at 3'UTR of Mecp2 reported, regulative effect unclear

Label: NR1/GRIN1
Comment: related to FASD (fetal alcohole spectrum disorder)</br>NMDA receptor subunit: There are 8 different variants of NR1, produced by alternative splicing of GRIN1

Label: TAF1
Comment: TAF1 RNA polymerase II, TATA box binding protein (TBP)-associated factor

Label: Gabrr2
Comment: gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA) C receptor, subunit rho 2

Label: mmu-miR-187-5p
Comment: no connection between Mecp2 and miR-187 in other sources than [3]

Label: REST
Comment: RE1-silencing transcription factor</br>Silences Mecp2 in non-neuronal tissue

Label: Gprin1
